Elgin.Addison Street:
Addison Street is a major east–west street on the north side of Chicago. Wrigley Field is located at 1060 West Addison Street, which is the home of the Chicago Cubs.


== Chicago communities ==
From east to west:
Lake View (City of Chicago)
North Center (City of Chicago)
Avondale (City of Chicago)
Irving Park (City of Chicago)
Portage Park (City of Chicago)
Dunning (City of Chicago)


== Points of interest ==
The Chicago Police Department's historic Town Hall Police Station is located at the intersection of Addison and Halsted Streets.
